channel.title: Giving RSCShadow access to this section
channel.description: I was wondering if you guys are fine with him having access to this section. I noticed that codeforfame said that not as many people as he thought would be contributing. RSCShadow is pretty handy with java and he is now interested in helping out because progress is actually being made. He knows a lot of PHP and can help out with the website a lot if needed.

item.title: Giving RSCShadow access to this section
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I went ahead and let him in here, since no one said anything bad about him, I guess this thread can stay.

Read full topic
item.source: Giving RSCShadow access to this section

item.title: Giving RSCShadow access to this section
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

I don’t see why not… I really don’t see an issue with letting anyone in, as long as they’re not going to troll, and do stupid things that are just annoying.

Read full topic
item.source: Giving RSCShadow access to this section
